page.title: 07BAYSTON HILL BOYS' GAMES
page.content:
BULLDOGS:-
One person stands in the middle of the playground.The others try to get past without being caught.Anyone caught joins the catcher and so forms a line across the playground.It becomes more difficult for the bulldogs to get past.The winner is the last one caught
CONKERS:- An Autumn game.Conkers are bored and strung.Two people take turns at hitting the others conker with the aim of breaking it.Winning conkers are given the score of wins.Some people bake or pickle them to make them harder.
